static member ListMetricsAsync : Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Fluent.IPartitionKeyRangeIdOperations * string * string * string * string * string * string * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<seq<Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Fluent.Models.PartitionMetric>>
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Fluent.PartitionKeyRangeIdOperationsExtensions.ListMetricsAsync (operations, resourceGroupName, accountName, databaseRid, collectionRid, partitionKeyRangeId, filter, cancellationToken)

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Name of an Azure resource group.
Partition Key Range Id for which to get data.

An OData filter expression that describes a subset of metrics to return. The parameters that can be filtered are name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names), startTime, endTime, and timeGrain. The supported operator is eq.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given partition key range id.
